input_text:
Job Title: Director of Marketing

Location: Marlton, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job Description

Great new Career Opportunity in Home Care!

Now Hiring - Director of Marketing - CareOne at Evesham Assisted Living

Hours

The Director of Marketing is responsible for, census management and referral development. Oversees the coordination of inquires, admissions, sales calls, public relations, community events, correspondence and communication with customers. Responsibilities can also include, but are not limited to:

 Creates and implements quarterly marketing/growth plan, including social media and other inbound marketing, community events and programs.  Provides overall marketing training and expertise to personnel to achieve increase in referral sources and better conversion rates from referral to patient. Educates Agency staff on the marketing component of their job.  Directs the completion of a minimum of 4 external sales calls per day with new and existing referrals sources.  Evaluates referral and admission records and analyzes results for trends on referral, admission an conversion actitivity.  In concert with Executive Director, provides feedback and performs customer problem resolution.  Collaborates with Executive Director to train and orients new marketing hires.  Serves on community boards/associations (i.e., Chamber of Commerce). 

Education

Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, Communication or other related field

Professional Experience

 3-5 years experience in Sales and marketing and/or related healthcare field background 

About Us

The CareOne mission is to define excellence within the health care community. We are dedicated to Maximizing Patient Outcomes. We treat Residents, their families and each other with respect, dignity and compassion. Through a collaborative and consultative approach, we strive to provide a framework of strength and stability for our Centers and Communities. We work to maintain the highest standards of care and service for Residents, families and our valued employees.

We Are Proud To Offer

 Competitive Salary  Comprehensive Healthcare Benefits  401k Retirement Plan  Paid Time Off  Opportunities to advance and grow your career  And More 

If working with people who are dedicated, compassionate, and concerned about their patients is essential to you, then you'll appreciate being a part of our team. We've built a strong reputation on the outstanding level of care that we provide. We have a graciously appointed facility with strong belief in patient care and service; join us at our beautiful facility!

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer

EEO/AA/M/F/DV

Experience Level (if available): Director
